forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Chance Drizzle then Chance Light Rain
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of drizzle between 10pm and 4am, then a chance of rain. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 54. South wind 5 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Veterans Day
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain likely before 4pm, then a slight chance of drizzle. Mostly cloudy. High near 61, with temperatures falling to around 56 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 10 to 17 mph, with gusts as high as 28 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

weather_report:
As the evening settles over Downtown San Francisco, an air of soft anticipation lingers, mingling with the promise of rain. The streets, glistening softly under streetlights, hint at a gentle drizzly start to the night, with the clouds swirling overhead, a muted tapestry cloaking the skyline. With a low temperature nudging towards 54 degrees, residents are met with the wispy caress of the south wind, occasionally picking up in gusts, a reminder of the restless ocean nearby. The likelihood of precipitation rests at about 40%, whispering that tonight may see a bit more than just a few drops, beckoning those who venture outdoors to embrace layers—a cozy sweater or a light rain jacket might be wise as the drizzle carries the scent of fresh earth.

Looking ahead to Veterans Day, the forecast prophesies a more substantial downpour, particularly before the afternoon settles in with a likelihood of rain at 70%. Those planning to traverse the city can expect temperatures hovering around the 61-degree mark, before dipping slightly as the day progresses. The clouds will retain their dominance, masking the sun and enveloping the city in a shroud reminiscent of a solemn, overcast day. For the sensitive to the chill, this calls for practical yet stylish attire—perhaps a water-resistant coat and comfortable shoes—perfect for navigating puddles on leisurely strolls through the park or cozying up in a welcoming café, enjoying the warm embrace of a cup of tea or coffee. With the backdrop of rain-swept streets, today could be an ideal moment for quiet reflection or spirited conversations over pastries, fully embracing the atmospheric richness that comes when the city weathers a storm.
